name: Bilibili BLACK
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document regexp("http(s)?://(www|space|search|bangumi|message|activity).bilibili.com.*") {
* {
    transition-timing-function: ease;
    transition-duration: .25s;
    transition-property: border-color, background-color, color;
}
html,
body,
#message_center {
    background-color: #000;
    color: #999;
}

.tminfo .charge-appeal-init:hover,

.header .num li.m-i .i_num li:hover {

}
.search-b-suggest .search-b-hotlist li,
.search-b-history li,
.subscribe-head,
.main-content-tab,
.table-wrapper,
.charge-manage .charge-agreement .charge-agreement-cont,
.control-inpt-input:hover,
.top-search,
.manage-tag-wrp .mng-tag-list li {
    border-color: #446;
}
.bilibili-comment .ipt-txt,
.pagelistbox .custom-right .custom-right-inner.custompage {
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.65) !important;
}
.bilibili-comment .ipt-txt:hover {
    background-color: #000 !important;
    color: #aaa;
}
.bilibili-comment .tg_send_post .biaoqing_box {
    background-color: #111;
}
.bilibili-comment .tg_send_post .ywz.open,
.z_top .search-hover #nav_searchform,
.search-b .search-b-content {
    border-color: #111;
    background: #111;
    color: #aaa;
}
.container,
.travelBox {
    background-color: #222;
}
.nav-search #nav_searchform,
.nav-search.search-focus #nav_searchform,
.message-main-lists .message-main-list .message-main-right .message-content-wrapper,
.search-input,
.browseMode:hover,
.video-manage .search .search-keyword,
.control-inpt-input {
    border-color: #222;
    background-color: #222;
}
.filter-block .filter-wrap .filter-list > a:hover {
    background: #356;
}
.z_top.b-header-blur .uns_box li.u-i a.i-link:hover,
.uns_box li.u-i a.i-link:hover {
    color: #fff;
}
.header .num li.m-i .i_num li:hover {
    background: #f25d8e;
}
#bofqi {
    margin: 0 auto;
    box-shadow: none;
}
.viewbox {
    position: relative;
    top: 5px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 4px 4px 0 0;
    background: none;
}
.viewbox .bangumi-buybuybuy,
.viewbox .upinfo {
    margin: 3px 0;
}
.bilibili-comment {
    padding: 0 12px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background: none;
}
.v-plist,
.alist,
.sponsor-list .list-total {
    background: rgba(17, 17, 17, 0.8);
}
.arc-toolbar {
    margin: 0 auto 15px !important;
    height: 79px !important;
    border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;
}
.b-icon-anim-fav {
    margin: 0 !important;
}
.charge-entrance .charge-support {
    background-color: rgba(22, 22, 22, 0.75);
}
.tag-list li .progress {
    background-color: #446;
}
.player-wrapper {
    margin: 5px 0 0 0;
    padding: 0;
}
.v-plist .plist-content,
.alist .plist-content,
.v-plist .alist-content,
.alist .alist-content,
.footer .boston-postcards {
    margin: 0;
}
.v-plist .curPage,
.alist .curPage,
.v-plist .p-close,
.alist .p-close,
.v-plist a,
.alist a {
    margin: 0 5px 3px;
}
.alist a,
.alist .p-close,
.v-plist a,
.v-plist .p-close {
    height: 14px !important;
    border-color: #334;
    background: #334;
    color: #aaa;
    line-height: 14px !important;
}
.v-plist .curPage,
.alist .curPage {
    height: 14px !important;
    line-height: 14px !important;
}
.v-plist .plist-content,
.alist .plist-content,
.v-plist .alist-content,
.alist .alist-content {
    height: auto;
}
.uns_box li.u-i.b-post a.i-link {
    z-index: 7001;
}
.header,
.header .header-layer {
    height: 100px !important;
    background: none !important;
}
.header .num {
    position: absolute;
    top: 42px;
    height: 55px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}
.header .num .search {
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 10px;
    right: 0px;
    z-index: 10000 !important;
}
.header .num .menu-wrapper,
.footer .footer-wrp {
    padding: 0;
}
.header .logo {
    top: -32px;
    left: -70px;
    z-index: 10001;
    transform: scale(0.3);
}
.header .h-center .banner-title {
    top: 92px;
    z-index: 200;
}
.rank-list-container .rank-list li .rank-item:hover {
    border: none;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 4px #111;
}
#i_menu_profile .member-bottom,
.a-layer {
    z-index: 400;
    border: 0;
    background-color: #334;
}
.header .num li.m-i {
    height: 55px;
}
.header .num li.m-i .v-num {
    top: 10px;
}
.widescreen .header .num li.m-i a.i-link em {
    margin: 0 13px;
    height: 50px;
}
.header .num li.m-i a.i-link em {
    margin: 0 7px;
    height: 50px;
}
.header .num li.m-i.m-i-square,
.header .num li.m-i.m-i-live {
    margin: 0 13px;
    height: 41px;
}
.header .num li.m-i .i_num {
    top: 48px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}
.viewbox .info .v-title-info .v-title-line,
.viewbox .info .v-title-info .v-title-line.icon_btn_coin {
    padding-right: 0;
}
.widescreen .v_large {
    width: auto;
    max-width: 1160px;
}
.v_large {
    width: auto;
    max-width: 980px;
}
.message-title,
.z_top,
#h-avatar,
#bofqi.float::before,
.index-nav .n-i.gotop .btn_gotop,
.whisper {
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #000;
}
.message-source-logo {
    border-radius: 15px;
}
.n .n-left,
.col-full,
.idc-btn.message,
.n-inner {
    box-shadow: none;
}
.section {
    padding: 12px;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
.stm-ly .ct .stm-filter li.on {
    border-bottom: 3px solid #446;
}
.stm-ly .stm-lst li {
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #000;
}
#page-index .col-1 {
    padding: 0;
    width: calc(100% - 370px);
}
#page-index .coin .content,
#page-index .video .content {
    margin: 0;
    width: auto;
}
.small-item {
    padding: 8px;
}
#i_menu_profile .member-bottom a.logout {
    margin: 0 0 6px;
    padding: 0 8px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    background: #b21;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #222;
    color: #ddd;
    font-weight: bold;
    line-height: 26px;
}
.elec-trigger,
.sxtjDiv,
.sxtj:hover .pxDiv {
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #222;
}
.box-title {
    text-shadow: none;
}
.video-manage .search .search-keyword {
    padding: 0 0 0 8px;
}
.control-inpt-input {
    box-shadow: inset 1px 1px 3px #111;
}
.recently-list .recently-list-detail {
    width: auto;
}
.recently-list .info-r .r {
    width: calc(100% - 170px);
}
.recently-list .recently-list-detail {
    border-radius: 4px;
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #222;
}
}

@-moz-document domain("www.bilibili.com") {
#searchform,
.link-ranking {
    background: #334 !important;
}
#searchform:hover,
#searchform:focus,
.link-ranking:hover {
    background: #446 !important;
}
.z_top .z_top_nav {
    margin: 0 0 0 85px;
}
}

@-moz-document regexp("http(s)?://(www|bangumi).bilibili.com.*") {
.bilibili-player-danmaku-function {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-danmaku-wrap {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-panel {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-control {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-sendbar {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-danmaku-input {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-inputbar {
    background: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-sendbar {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-auxiliary-area {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-info {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-watching-number {
    background-color: #222 !important;
    color: white !important;
}
.bilibili-player-filter-btn {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player .bilibili-player-auxiliary-area .bilibili-player-filter .bpui-button.active .bpui-button-text,
.bilibili-player .bilibili-player-auxiliary-area .bilibili-player-filter .bpui-button.active.bpui-state-hover .bpui-button-text {
    color: white !important;
}
.bilibili-player-danmaku-btn-history {
    background-color: #262626 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-color-picker-container {
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
.bilibili-player-video-float-lastplay {
    background-color: #333 !important;
}
}
